title: Three pirates bold
creator_credit: Ilya Tolston, Victor Kayfetz, George K. Arthur and Go Pictures
brief_description: On the advice of an old sail maker two boys and a dog hunt for treasure on an island in the Bahamas. Discouraged after strenuous but unfruitful digging, they dive for crayfish which they then sell to a local crayfish dealer.
creator_credit_for_label: Ilya Tolston, Victor Kayfetz, George K. Arthur and Go Pictures
